name: Pocket spring mattress, medium firm/white, Queen
description: A medium-firm 11 in high innovative double layer pocket spring mattress. You get ultimate comfort and perfect support from comfort zones that adjust to your body. A generous layer of foam adds to the feel!

name: Hybrid mattress, firm/white, Queen
description: A medium-firm 11 in high innovative double layer pocket spring mattress. You get ultimate comfort and perfect support from comfort zones that adjust to your body. A generous layer of foam adds to the feel!

name: Eurotop hybrid mattress, plush/white, Queen
description: A 12⅝ high mattress with a double layer of innovative pocket springs and an integrated topper with an upper layer of plush foam. Wonderful comfort and support from comfort zones that adjust to your body.

name: Upholstered bed frame, Kilanda light beige/Luröy, King
description: This upholstered bed frame makes your bedroom feel soft and warm. The curved headboard and piped edges create a classic look – and the entire cover is removable and machine washable.

name: Bed with headboard and storage, anthracite, King
description: There’s plenty of space in the drawers for clothes, extra duvets and sweet dreams – and you can position the headboard’s box and shelf so your favorite book is easy to reach. A perfect combination!

name: Bed frame with storage & headboard, white/Luröy, King
description: A bed frame with hidden storage in several places – perfect if you live in a small space. The BRIMNES series has several smart solutions that help you save space.

name: Bed frame, white stain/Luröy, King
description: Sustainable beauty from sustainably-sourced solid wood, a durable and renewable material that maintains its genuine character with each passing year. Combines with the other furniture in the HEMNES series.

name: Bed frame, white/Vissle beige, Queen
description: KLEPPSTAD has a stylish and modern design with a metal bed frame and a cozy textile headboard. Easy to both buy and take home since it’s sold as two compact packages. So practical and convenient!

name: Upholstered bed frame, Naggen beige, Queen
description: The sloping headboard and soft upholstery make IDANÄS upholstered bed frame extra comfortable. Wake up with coffee and a morning paper! Classic button detailing and turned wooden legs are timeless.

name: Bed frame with 4 storage boxes, brown/Luröy, Queen
description: A sturdy bed frame with soft, profile edges and high legs. A classic shape that will last for many years. Also, there are spacious storage boxes under the bed where you can store bedding or clothes.

name: Upholstered storage bed, Gunnared dark gray, Queen
description: The sloping headboard and soft upholstery make this bed frame extra comfortable. Classic button detailing and turned wooden legs are timeless, while soft-closing drawers under the bed add everyday storage.

name: Bed frame with storage, white/Luröy, Queen
description: When you live in a small space you need to be clever. That’s probably why you’re looking at this bed frame with 4 spacious drawers. The BRIMNES series has several heroes that help you save space.
